!READ_IMPORTANT!: This is an example response, do not request this in your app! Request https://api.brawlify.com/ endpoints!

list.name: Hot Zone
list.title: Control the Zones!
list.tutorial: Control the Hot Zones to win! Establish control and earn points by being inside a zone while keeping opponents out. When the time runs out, the team with the most points wins! Watch out for the double points in the final moments.

list.name: Super City Rampage
list.title: Three players vs the MEGA MONSTER
list.tutorial:
Can you beat the Mega Monster and save the City? Join forces with two teammates to take down the Mega Monster. You can get back in the fight as long as at least one of your teammates is standing. If everyone falls OR all buildings get destroyed, the match is over!

Rampages increase in Challenge, from Normal all the way to Insane, every time you manage to beat the Mega Monster.

list.name: Present Plunder
list.title: Grab two gifts to win!
list.tutorial: Grab gifts from the opposing team and bring them to your base! Match ends when one team has captured two gifts, or when time runs out.
list.description: Grab two gifts from opponents to win!

list.name: Gem Grab
list.title: 3 vs 3
list.tutorial: Collect Gems that pop out of the Gem Mine in the middle of the map. Or, just take them from fallen opponents! Hold ten gems for the duration of a countdown to win the game!
list.description: Collect Gems that pop out of the Gem Mine in the middle of the map.

list.name: Solo Showdown
list.title: Survive the Arena
list.tutorial: Go alone or with a partner to fight in the Showdown Arena! Whoever's still standing at the end wins. Collect Power Cubes to increase your Health and Attack damage. There are poison clouds closing in, so keep moving!

list.name: Duo Showdown
list.title: Survive the Arena
list.tutorial: Go alone or with a partner to fight in the Showdown Arena! Whoever's still standing at the end wins. Collect Power Cubes to increase your Health and Attack damage. There are poison clouds closing in, so keep moving!
list.shortDescription: Five teams with two players each.

list.name: Heist
list.title: 3 vs 3
list.tutorial: Protect your team's valuable safe, while trying to break open the enemy team's safe at the same time! Whichever team busts open the enemy safe first wins. If time runs out, the team that caused more damage to the enemy team's safe is declared winner.

list.name: Bounty
list.title: 3 vs 3
list.tutorial: Collect Stars for your team by defeating players on the enemy team. Every time you defeat an enemy, the bounty on your head increases by one Star, up to seven Stars. Don't give them to the enemy! The team that has more Stars when the clock runs out wins.
list.description: Team with more stars collected at the end wins.

list.name: Brawl Ball
list.title: 3 vs 3
list.tutorial: Take the ball to the opposing team's goal to score! Match ends when one team scores two goals, or at full time.
list.description: Score goals to the opposing team and prevent them from scoring.

list.name: Siege
list.title: 3 vs 3
list.tutorial: Siege and destroy the enemy's IKE assembly turret! Your team also has an IKE: feed it bolts, and it will assemble a powerful Siege Robot to fight for you. Bolts appear randomly around the middle of the map. Grab a bolt and hold it for a few seconds to feed it to your IKE. There are up to three Sieges during each match. The team that has more bolts at the start of each Siege builds a Siege Robot. The more bolts, the stronger the robot. Watch out, IKEs have powerful ballistic defenses - don't get too close to the enemy base without a Siege Robot to help you!
list.description: Build robots by collecting screws and fight the other team.

list.name: Takedown
list.title: All vs All
list.tutorial: Make more damage against the Boss than the other players. The more damage you make, the higher you will rank in the match. Collect Power Cubes to increase your Health and Attack damage. Power Cubes will randomly spawn on the map during the battle!
list.description: Deal the most damage to the Boss.

list.name: Lone Star
list.title: All vs All
list.tutorial: Collect Stars by defeating enemy players. Every time you defeat an enemy, the bounty on your head increases by one Star, up to seven Stars. The one with the most Stars when the clock runs out wins.
list.description: Collect most stars in a solo game.
list.shortDescription: Collect stars in a solo game.

list.name: Robo Rumble
list.title: Three players vs Robo Bandits
list.tutorial: Defend the safe from greedy Robo Bandits! The longer you defend, the better your reward! Robots will be coming for the safe from all sides, and in ever-increasing numbers. Do your best to defend as long as you can!
list.description: Defend your safe from robots coming in waves for as long as you can.

list.name: Big Game
list.title: 5 vs 1
list.tutorial: Five players attempt to defeat one player's BIG BRAWLER. As the BIG BRAWLER, you'll have a massive power advantage, and a huge amount of health that drains slowly. Defy the hunters and stay in the game as long as you can! As one of the five hunters, you'll need to work together with your team to take down the BIG BRAWLER as fast as possible!
list.description: Kill the boss player as soon as you can.

list.name: Boss Fight
list.title: Defeat the Boss
list.tutorial: Can you beat the formidable Boss Robot? Join forces with two teammates and take down this monster. You can get back in the fight as long as at least one of your teammates is standing. If everyone falls, it's game over! Boss Fights increase in Challenge, from Normal all the way to Insane, every time you manage to beat the Boss.
list.description: Fight the boss robot and don't die as a team.

list.name: Training
list.title: Tutorial
list.tutorial: Learn how to play the game on training maps.
list.description: Train yourself to become the best.
